titles.title: Colorado River Basin System Conservation Extension Act of 2025
Colorado River Basin System Conservation Extension Act of 2025
To amend the Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2015, to reauthorize the Colorado River System conservation pilot program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Wildlife and Fisheries.
Subcommittee on Water, Wildlife and Fisheries Discharged
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.
